website_summaries.verdict: This spacious and powerful microwave is versatile enough to handle the frequent use of an average family or the occasional needs of a smaller household.
pros: The 1.4 cubic feet provides enough interior space for cooking some large dishes
1100 watts of power means those dishes get cooked thoroughly and evenly
This model offers 11 one-touch keys for popular microwave items, so it covers common microwave uses as well
Danby's standard 10 power levels are also included
The attractive white exterior matches well with most kitchen decor
cons: This larger unit may be impractical for kitchens with limited counter space

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUSLY DEFECTIVE!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! Have owned this microwave for 7 months and it is used occasionally by 2 adults. The glass pane on the door completely shattered and sprayed glass shards everywhere after simply pressing the button to open the door. VERY DANGEROUS. Amazon did nothing as the 30 day window for returns expired, which is unfortunate given that (1) the product is obviously defective, and (2) the life of an appliance--regardless of cost--should last longer than 7 months. Now I have to contact the manufacturer, have them file a claim, see if they will agree to fix the busted microwave, and wait the endless days while eating cold pizza. Pay more for something better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well working
customer_reviews.text: It is on the larger size that’s why I give 3 stars for small spaces. None the less it is a great working microwave in general.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Queen

customer_reviews.title: The King Of Microwaves
customer_reviews.text: The best microwave I ever bought, well it's the only microwave I ever bought. I would have preferred one in black, but the price was right. And fast shipping, it arrived the next day. Probably because the seller was in the same state as I am. I love it when a purchase comes together!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the microwave oven I had for a very long time. It took some getting use to a new way of operation. The instructions are not as clear as they could be, but I am satisfied with the performance. I have had it for 2 months. I'm still experimenting with time settings. I used it manly for heating food and baking potatoes. the one thing I'm not keen about is that at the end of its cook time it beeps five times in rapid succession, my old oven beeped just once.
customer_reviews.author: Mary  Castle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for small counter. don't expect it to be huge. a lot of function that i never used also. Nice!! It has 10 different heat settings including defrost, cook delay, a keep warm feature, and it's very quiet. For the price of this machine, you can't go wrong!! don't think that is a valid complaint. I can see fine when putting items in and the light in my kitchen is plenty for me while cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: hao wei wu

customer_reviews.title: Microwave for big families
customer_reviews.text: Not for small places but that is why we bought it. We have a family of 6 and expected it to be bigger since it is 1,100 watts. It works great and have had no problem with it. Yes, the only down side is that it is a bit big for our kitchen but we can always reorganize the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Pastor Jr

customer_reviews.title: After 35 years of owning microwaves - this one cooks the fastest and the best!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of comparison evaluating before I chose this Danby. I needed it small enough for an apartment counter top but large enough for large plates - plus I wanted higher power than most small ones. It was exactly what I hoped for - plus it has the instant time settings - one push of a button. It was a little noisy - rattled on top when running. I put a place mat and baking dish on top and it stopped. I know that shouldn't be - but it is light weight metal and affordable so a small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Wendy J. Flint

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend buying this
customer_reviews.text: Bought the larger version but this just has a bubble out the back (like a toaster oven with the back bubbled out to allow room for a pizza) of microwave so if you have something larger it won't clear the sides. We have had a microwave for years with identical wattage but it finally died, ordered this one with same wattage but it takes half again as long, at least, to heat anything even on highest setting. VERY slow to heat. Would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Shopish

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great!..like the fact that it came with extra bottom sticker in case of wear
customer_reviews.author: Ladyjadedsky

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with 2 dents on top, but works. Needed for elderly shut in who cannot repack or do without. Incredibly disappointed. Is this venue a way for manufacturers to unload damaged goods in the hope that the recipient is not able to return them?
customer_reviews.author: Emma Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Solid in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! I've had ourt about three weeks and can't find anything to complain about, solid choice for the money
customer_reviews.author: M. Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy so far!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great microwave so far. It is pretty quiet and is simple enough to operate, but has the fancy options too.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: Like the style and the way it goes with otherstuff in my kitchen. but mainly I like the way it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Wimmer

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave. Works well. Only one small issue/note the latch to open door is a little awkward. If you hold your fingers under the latch and push open with your thumb it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the average kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave for the money. Only complaint is that it is a little noisy but when you're hungry, noise is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Melancon MD

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: Button panels broken after 1 month. Left side buttons no longer work.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory..
customer_reviews.text: Very basic, works fine, a little noisier than I like (both mechanically and the door) and is a great price for what you are getting. For instance, the microwave I am replacing cost about $800. I wouldn't say the same negatives on that one... but it cost 8X as much. This one is a good deal if you aren't looking for top-of-the-line.
customer_reviews.author: John Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much- heats evenly and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Pitman
